summary: Diff adds a multi-page React marketing site with TanStack Router routes for Home/Services/Why Us/Products/Careers/Contact, a global header/footer with logo and CTA, theme styling, and basic page/section animations with reduced-motion support. It also adds a Motoko backend with seeded jobs and endpoints for listing jobs and submitting job applications/contact forms, but several requirements are not evidenced (notably custom-domain well-known + DNS docs, favicon/app icon, and explicit stable/persistent storage across upgrades and admin listing APIs).

missing_requirements.requirement: Provide a favicon/app icon based on the provided logo (IMG-20250404-WA0002.png).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff shows the logo used in header/footer, but no favicon/app icon files or HTML manifest changes are shown in the added files list.

missing_requirements.requirement: Persist job postings/applications across canister upgrades using the templateâ€™s standard persistence approach, and provide an admin/dev API to list applications.
missing_requirements.reason: backend/main.mo shows in-memory Maps for jobs and jobApplications but the diff does not evidence stable variables or preupgrade/postupgrade hooks. Also, no method to list applications is visible in the provided backend snippet.

missing_requirements.requirement: Backend exposes a method to list contact submissions (admin/dev use) and contact form submissions are persisted.
missing_requirements.reason: frontend calls actor.getCompanyContacts() and submitContactForm(), but the backend snippet is truncated before showing contact submission storage/list APIs. Persistence across upgrades is also not evidenced (no stable vars/hooks shown).

missing_requirements.requirement: Include /.well-known/ic-domains in the frontend build output with domain value for glitchip.in, and document Cloudflare DNS record instructions for GoDaddy domain connection.
missing_requirements.reason: No .well-known/ic-domains file or documentation file (e.g., README) is shown in the diff summary.

hallucinated_features.description: Added Internet Identity authentication plumbing (InternetIdentityProvider/useInternetIdentity) and actor initialization that uses an admin secret token parameter (caffeineAdminToken) to initialize access control.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly lists third-party auth as a non-goal and states Internet Identity is supported but not required; the marketing site requirements do not request adding auth flows or admin-token URL parameter handling.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend access control/authorization and user profile management APIs (get/save user profile, admin checks).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only requires Careers and Contact storage/APIs; user profiles and a generalized access-control system are not requested.
